00060     const char *cuda_error_string(CUresult result)
00061     {
00062         switch(result) {
00063             case CUDA_SUCCESS: return "No errors";
00064             case CUDA_ERROR_INVALID_VALUE: return "Invalid value";
00065             case CUDA_ERROR_OUT_OF_MEMORY: return "Out of memory";
00066             case CUDA_ERROR_NOT_INITIALIZED: return "Driver not initialized";
00067             case CUDA_ERROR_DEINITIALIZED: return "Driver deinitialized";
00068 
00069             case CUDA_ERROR_NO_DEVICE: return "No CUDA-capable device available";
00070             case CUDA_ERROR_INVALID_DEVICE: return "Invalid device";
00071 
00072             case CUDA_ERROR_INVALID_IMAGE: return "Invalid kernel image";
00073             case CUDA_ERROR_INVALID_CONTEXT: return "Invalid context";
00074             case CUDA_ERROR_CONTEXT_ALREADY_CURRENT: return "Context already current";
00075             case CUDA_ERROR_MAP_FAILED: return "Map failed";
00076             case CUDA_ERROR_UNMAP_FAILED: return "Unmap failed";
00077             case CUDA_ERROR_ARRAY_IS_MAPPED: return "Array is mapped";
00078             case CUDA_ERROR_ALREADY_MAPPED: return "Already mapped";
00079             case CUDA_ERROR_NO_BINARY_FOR_GPU: return "No binary for GPU";
00080             case CUDA_ERROR_ALREADY_ACQUIRED: return "Already acquired";
00081             case CUDA_ERROR_NOT_MAPPED: return "Not mapped";
00082             case CUDA_ERROR_NOT_MAPPED_AS_ARRAY: return "Mapped resource not available for access as an array";
00083             case CUDA_ERROR_NOT_MAPPED_AS_POINTER: return "Mapped resource not available for access as a pointer";
00084             case CUDA_ERROR_ECC_UNCORRECTABLE: return "Uncorrectable ECC error detected";
00085             case CUDA_ERROR_UNSUPPORTED_LIMIT: return "CUlimit not supported by device";
00086 
00087             case CUDA_ERROR_INVALID_SOURCE: return "Invalid source";
00088             case CUDA_ERROR_FILE_NOT_FOUND: return "File not found";
00089             case CUDA_ERROR_SHARED_OBJECT_SYMBOL_NOT_FOUND: return "Link to a shared object failed to resolve";
00090             case CUDA_ERROR_SHARED_OBJECT_INIT_FAILED: return "Shared object initialization failed";
00091 
00092             case CUDA_ERROR_INVALID_HANDLE: return "Invalid handle";
00093 
00094             case CUDA_ERROR_NOT_FOUND: return "Not found";
00095 
00096             case CUDA_ERROR_NOT_READY: return "CUDA not ready";
00097 
00098             case CUDA_ERROR_LAUNCH_FAILED: return "Launch failed";
00099             case CUDA_ERROR_LAUNCH_OUT_OF_RESOURCES: return "Launch exceeded resources";
00100             case CUDA_ERROR_LAUNCH_TIMEOUT: return "Launch exceeded timeout";
00101             case CUDA_ERROR_LAUNCH_INCOMPATIBLE_TEXTURING: return "Launch with incompatible texturing";
00102 
00103             case CUDA_ERROR_UNKNOWN: return "Unknown error";
00104 
00105             default: return "Unknown CUDA error value";
00106         }
00107     }
00108 
00109 #ifdef NDEBUG
00110 #define cuda_abort()
00111 #else
00112 #define cuda_abort() abort()
00113 #endif
00114 
00115 #define cuda_assert(stmt) \
00116     { \
00117         CUresult result = stmt; \
00118         \
00119         if(result != CUDA_SUCCESS) { \
00120             string message = string_printf("CUDA error: %s in %s", cuda_error_string(result), #stmt); \
00121             if(error_msg == "") \
00122                 error_msg = message; \
00123             fprintf(stderr, "%s\n", message.c_str()); \
00124             cuda_abort(); \
00125         } \
00126     }
00127 
00128     bool cuda_error(CUresult result)
00129     {
00130         if(result == CUDA_SUCCESS)
00131             return false;
00132 
00133         string message = string_printf("CUDA error: %s", cuda_error_string(result));
00134         if(error_msg == "")
00135             error_msg = message;
00136         fprintf(stderr, "%s\n", message.c_str());
00137         return true;
00138     }
00139 
00140     void cuda_error(const string& message)
00141     {
00142         if(error_msg == "")
00143             error_msg = message;
00144         fprintf(stderr, "%s\n", message.c_str());
00145     }
00146 
00147     void cuda_push_context()
00148     {
00149         cuda_assert(cuCtxSetCurrent(cuContext))
00150     }
00151 
00152     void cuda_pop_context()
00153     {
00154         cuda_assert(cuCtxSetCurrent(NULL));
00155     }
00156 
00157     CUDADevice(DeviceInfo& info, bool background_)
00158     {
00159         background = background_;
00160 
00161         cuDevId = info.num;
00162         cuDevice = 0;
00163         cuContext = 0;
00164 
00165         /* intialize */
00166         if(cuda_error(cuInit(0)))
00167             return;
00168 
00169         /* setup device and context */
00170         if(cuda_error(cuDeviceGet(&cuDevice, cuDevId)))
00171             return;
00172 
00173         CUresult result;
00174 
00175         if(background)
00176             result = cuCtxCreate(&cuContext, 0, cuDevice);
00177         else
00178             result = cuGLCtxCreate(&cuContext, 0, cuDevice);
00179 
00180         if(cuda_error(result))
00181             return;
00182 
00183         cuda_pop_context();
00184     }
00185 
00186     ~CUDADevice()
00187     {
00188         cuda_push_context();
00189         cuda_assert(cuCtxDetach(cuContext))
00190     }

00192     bool support_device(bool experimental)
00193     {
00194         if(!experimental) {
00195             int major, minor;
00196             cuDeviceComputeCapability(&major, &minor, cuDevId);
00197 
00198             if(major <= 1 && minor <= 2) {
00199                 cuda_error(string_printf("CUDA device supported only with compute capability 1.3 or up, found %d.%d.", major, minor));
00200                 return false;
00201             }
00202         }
00203 
00204         return true;
00205     }
00206 
00207     string compile_kernel()
00208     {
00209         /* compute cubin name */
00210         int major, minor;
00211         cuDeviceComputeCapability(&major, &minor, cuDevId);
00212 
00213         /* attempt to use kernel provided with blender */
00214         string cubin = path_get(string_printf("lib/kernel_sm_%d%d.cubin", major, minor));
00215         if(path_exists(cubin))
00216             return cubin;
00217 
00218         /* not found, try to use locally compiled kernel */
00219         string kernel_path = path_get("kernel");
00220         string md5 = path_files_md5_hash(kernel_path);
00221 
00222         cubin = string_printf("cycles_kernel_sm%d%d_%s.cubin", major, minor, md5.c_str());;
00223         cubin = path_user_get(path_join("cache", cubin));
00224 
00225         /* if exists already, use it */
00226         if(path_exists(cubin))
00227             return cubin;
00228 
00229 #if defined(WITH_CUDA_BINARIES) && defined(_WIN32)
00230         if(major <= 1 && minor <= 2)
00231             cuda_error(string_printf("CUDA device supported only compute capability 1.3 or up, found %d.%d.", major, minor));
00232         else
00233             cuda_error(string_printf("CUDA binary kernel for this graphics card compute capability (%d.%d) not found.", major, minor));
00234         return "";
00235 #else
00236         /* if not, find CUDA compiler */
00237         string nvcc = cuCompilerPath();
00238 
00239         if(nvcc == "") {
00240             cuda_error("CUDA nvcc compiler not found. Install CUDA toolkit in default location.");
00241             return "";
00242         }
00243 
00244         /* compile */
00245         string kernel = path_join(kernel_path, "kernel.cu");
00246         string include = kernel_path;
00247         const int machine = system_cpu_bits();
00248         const int maxreg = 24;
00249 
00250         double starttime = time_dt();
00251         printf("Compiling CUDA kernel ...\n");
00252 
00253         path_create_directories(cubin);
00254 
00255         string command = string_printf("\"%s\" -arch=sm_%d%d -m%d --cubin \"%s\" --use_fast_math "
00256             "-o \"%s\" --ptxas-options=\"-v\" --maxrregcount=%d --opencc-options -OPT:Olimit=0 -I\"%s\" -DNVCC",
00257             nvcc.c_str(), major, minor, machine, kernel.c_str(), cubin.c_str(), maxreg, include.c_str());
00258 
00259         if(system(command.c_str()) == -1) {
00260             cuda_error("Failed to execute compilation command, see console for details.");
00261             return "";
00262         }
00263 
00264         /* verify if compilation succeeded */
00265         if(!path_exists(cubin)) {
00266             cuda_error("CUDA kernel compilation failed, see console for details.");
00267             return "";
00268         }
00269 
00270         printf("Kernel compilation finished in %.2lfs.\n", time_dt() - starttime);
00271 
00272         return cubin;
00273 #endif
00274     }
00275 
00276     bool load_kernels(bool experimental)
00277     {
00278         /* check if cuda init succeeded */
00279         if(cuContext == 0)
00280             return false;
00281 
00282         if(!support_device(experimental))
00283             return false;
00284 
00285         /* get kernel */
00286         string cubin = compile_kernel();
00287 
00288         if(cubin == "")
00289             return false;
00290 
00291         /* open module */
00292         cuda_push_context();
00293 
00294         CUresult result = cuModuleLoad(&cuModule, cubin.c_str());
00295         if(cuda_error(result))
00296             cuda_error(string_printf("Failed loading CUDA kernel %s.", cubin.c_str()));
00297 
00298         cuda_pop_context();
00299 
00300         return (result == CUDA_SUCCESS);
00301     }
00302 
00303     void mem_alloc(device_memory& mem, MemoryType type)
00304     {
00305         cuda_push_context();
00306         CUdeviceptr device_pointer;
00307         cuda_assert(cuMemAlloc(&device_pointer, mem.memory_size()))
00308         mem.device_pointer = (device_ptr)device_pointer;
00309         cuda_pop_context();
00310     }
00311 
00312     void mem_copy_to(device_memory& mem)
00313     {
00314         cuda_push_context();
00315         cuda_assert(cuMemcpyHtoD(cuda_device_ptr(mem.device_pointer), (void*)mem.data_pointer, mem.memory_size()))
00316         cuda_pop_context();
00317     }
00318 
00319     void mem_copy_from(device_memory& mem, int y, int w, int h, int elem)
00320     {
00321         size_t offset = elem*y*w;
00322         size_t size = elem*w*h;
00323 
00324         cuda_push_context();
00325         cuda_assert(cuMemcpyDtoH((uchar*)mem.data_pointer + offset,
00326             (CUdeviceptr)((uchar*)mem.device_pointer + offset), size))
00327         cuda_pop_context();
00328     }
00329 
00330     void mem_zero(device_memory& mem)
00331     {
00332         memset((void*)mem.data_pointer, 0, mem.memory_size());
00333 
00334         cuda_push_context();
00335         cuda_assert(cuMemsetD8(cuda_device_ptr(mem.device_pointer), 0, mem.memory_size()))
00336         cuda_pop_context();
00337     }
00338 
00339     void mem_free(device_memory& mem)
00340     {
00341         if(mem.device_pointer) {
00342             cuda_push_context();
00343             cuda_assert(cuMemFree(cuda_device_ptr(mem.device_pointer)))
00344             cuda_pop_context();
00345 
00346             mem.device_pointer = 0;
00347         }
00348     }
00349 
00350     void const_copy_to(const char *name, void *host, size_t size)
00351     {
00352         CUdeviceptr mem;
00353         size_t bytes;
00354 
00355         cuda_push_context();
00356         cuda_assert(cuModuleGetGlobal(&mem, &bytes, cuModule, name))
00357         //assert(bytes == size);
00358         cuda_assert(cuMemcpyHtoD(mem, host, size))
00359         cuda_pop_context();
00360     }
00361 
00362     void tex_alloc(const char *name, device_memory& mem, bool interpolation, bool periodic)
00363     {
00364         /* determine format */
00365         CUarray_format_enum format;
00366         size_t dsize = datatype_size(mem.data_type);
00367         size_t size = mem.memory_size();
00368 
00369         switch(mem.data_type) {
00370             case TYPE_UCHAR: format = CU_AD_FORMAT_UNSIGNED_INT8; break;
00371             case TYPE_UINT: format = CU_AD_FORMAT_UNSIGNED_INT32; break;
00372             case TYPE_INT: format = CU_AD_FORMAT_SIGNED_INT32; break;
00373             case TYPE_FLOAT: format = CU_AD_FORMAT_FLOAT; break;
00374             default: assert(0); return;
00375         }
00376 
00377         CUtexref texref;
00378 
00379         cuda_push_context();
00380         cuda_assert(cuModuleGetTexRef(&texref, cuModule, name))
00381 
00382         if(interpolation) {
00383             CUarray handle;
00384             CUDA_ARRAY_DESCRIPTOR desc;
00385 
00386             desc.Width = mem.data_width;
00387             desc.Height = mem.data_height;
00388             desc.Format = format;
00389             desc.NumChannels = mem.data_elements;
00390 
00391             cuda_assert(cuArrayCreate(&handle, &desc))
00392 
00393             if(mem.data_height > 1) {
00394                 CUDA_MEMCPY2D param;
00395                 memset(&param, 0, sizeof(param));
00396                 param.dstMemoryType = CU_MEMORYTYPE_ARRAY;
00397                 param.dstArray = handle;
00398                 param.srcMemoryType = CU_MEMORYTYPE_HOST;
00399                 param.srcHost = (void*)mem.data_pointer;
00400                 param.srcPitch = mem.data_width*dsize*mem.data_elements;
00401                 param.WidthInBytes = param.srcPitch;
00402                 param.Height = mem.data_height;
00403 
00404                 cuda_assert(cuMemcpy2D(&param))
00405             }
00406             else
00407                 cuda_assert(cuMemcpyHtoA(handle, 0, (void*)mem.data_pointer, size))
00408 
00409             cuda_assert(cuTexRefSetArray(texref, handle, CU_TRSA_OVERRIDE_FORMAT))
00410 
00411             cuda_assert(cuTexRefSetFilterMode(texref, CU_TR_FILTER_MODE_LINEAR))
00412             cuda_assert(cuTexRefSetFlags(texref, CU_TRSF_NORMALIZED_COORDINATES))
00413 
00414             mem.device_pointer = (device_ptr)handle;
00415         }
00416         else {
00417             cuda_pop_context();
00418 
00419             mem_alloc(mem, MEM_READ_ONLY);
00420             mem_copy_to(mem);
00421 
00422             cuda_push_context();
00423 
00424             cuda_assert(cuTexRefSetAddress(NULL, texref, cuda_device_ptr(mem.device_pointer), size))
00425             cuda_assert(cuTexRefSetFilterMode(texref, CU_TR_FILTER_MODE_POINT))
00426             cuda_assert(cuTexRefSetFlags(texref, CU_TRSF_READ_AS_INTEGER))
00427         }
00428 
00429         if(periodic) {
00430             cuda_assert(cuTexRefSetAddressMode(texref, 0, CU_TR_ADDRESS_MODE_WRAP))
00431             cuda_assert(cuTexRefSetAddressMode(texref, 1, CU_TR_ADDRESS_MODE_WRAP))
00432         }
00433         else {
00434             cuda_assert(cuTexRefSetAddressMode(texref, 0, CU_TR_ADDRESS_MODE_CLAMP))
00435             cuda_assert(cuTexRefSetAddressMode(texref, 1, CU_TR_ADDRESS_MODE_CLAMP))
00436         }
00437         cuda_assert(cuTexRefSetFormat(texref, format, mem.data_elements))
00438 
00439         cuda_pop_context();
00440 
00441         tex_interp_map[mem.device_pointer] = interpolation;
00442     }
00443 
00444     void tex_free(device_memory& mem)
00445     {
00446         if(mem.device_pointer) {
00447             if(tex_interp_map[mem.device_pointer]) {
00448                 cuda_push_context();
00449                 cuArrayDestroy((CUarray)mem.device_pointer);
00450                 cuda_pop_context();
00451 
00452                 tex_interp_map.erase(tex_interp_map.find(mem.device_pointer));
00453                 mem.device_pointer = 0;
00454             }
00455             else {
00456                 tex_interp_map.erase(tex_interp_map.find(mem.device_pointer));
00457                 mem_free(mem);
00458             }
00459         }
00460     }
00461 
00462     void path_trace(DeviceTask& task)
00463     {
00464         cuda_push_context();
00465 
00466         CUfunction cuPathTrace;
00467         CUdeviceptr d_buffer = cuda_device_ptr(task.buffer);
00468         CUdeviceptr d_rng_state = cuda_device_ptr(task.rng_state);
00469 
00470         /* get kernel function */
00471         cuda_assert(cuModuleGetFunction(&cuPathTrace, cuModule, "kernel_cuda_path_trace"))
00472         
00473         /* pass in parameters */
00474         int offset = 0;
00475         
00476         cuda_assert(cuParamSetv(cuPathTrace, offset, &d_buffer, sizeof(d_buffer)))
00477         offset += sizeof(d_buffer);
00478 
00479         cuda_assert(cuParamSetv(cuPathTrace, offset, &d_rng_state, sizeof(d_rng_state)))
00480         offset += sizeof(d_rng_state);
00481 
00482         int sample = task.sample;
00483         offset = align_up(offset, __alignof(sample));
00484 
00485         cuda_assert(cuParamSeti(cuPathTrace, offset, task.sample))
00486         offset += sizeof(task.sample);
00487 
00488         cuda_assert(cuParamSeti(cuPathTrace, offset, task.x))
00489         offset += sizeof(task.x);
00490 
00491         cuda_assert(cuParamSeti(cuPathTrace, offset, task.y))
00492         offset += sizeof(task.y);
00493 
00494         cuda_assert(cuParamSeti(cuPathTrace, offset, task.w))
00495         offset += sizeof(task.w);
00496 
00497         cuda_assert(cuParamSeti(cuPathTrace, offset, task.h))
00498         offset += sizeof(task.h);
00499 
00500         cuda_assert(cuParamSeti(cuPathTrace, offset, task.offset))
00501         offset += sizeof(task.offset);
00502 
00503         cuda_assert(cuParamSeti(cuPathTrace, offset, task.stride))
00504         offset += sizeof(task.stride);
00505 
00506         cuda_assert(cuParamSetSize(cuPathTrace, offset))
00507 
00508         /* launch kernel: todo find optimal size, cache config for fermi */
00509 #ifndef __APPLE__
00510         int xthreads = 16;
00511         int ythreads = 16;
00512 #else
00513         int xthreads = 8;
00514         int ythreads = 8;
00515 #endif
00516         int xblocks = (task.w + xthreads - 1)/xthreads;
00517         int yblocks = (task.h + ythreads - 1)/ythreads;
00518 
00519         cuda_assert(cuFuncSetCacheConfig(cuPathTrace, CU_FUNC_CACHE_PREFER_L1))
00520         cuda_assert(cuFuncSetBlockShape(cuPathTrace, xthreads, ythreads, 1))
00521         cuda_assert(cuLaunchGrid(cuPathTrace, xblocks, yblocks))
00522 
00523         cuda_pop_context();
00524     }
00525 
00526     void tonemap(DeviceTask& task)
00527     {
00528         cuda_push_context();
00529 
00530         CUfunction cuFilmConvert;
00531         CUdeviceptr d_rgba = map_pixels(task.rgba);
00532         CUdeviceptr d_buffer = cuda_device_ptr(task.buffer);
00533 
00534         /* get kernel function */
00535         cuda_assert(cuModuleGetFunction(&cuFilmConvert, cuModule, "kernel_cuda_tonemap"))
00536 
00537         /* pass in parameters */
00538         int offset = 0;
00539 
00540         cuda_assert(cuParamSetv(cuFilmConvert, offset, &d_rgba, sizeof(d_rgba)))
00541         offset += sizeof(d_rgba);
00542         
00543         cuda_assert(cuParamSetv(cuFilmConvert, offset, &d_buffer, sizeof(d_buffer)))
00544         offset += sizeof(d_buffer);
00545 
00546         int sample = task.sample;
00547         offset = align_up(offset, __alignof(sample));
00548 
00549         cuda_assert(cuParamSeti(cuFilmConvert, offset, task.sample))
00550         offset += sizeof(task.sample);
00551 
00552         cuda_assert(cuParamSeti(cuFilmConvert, offset, task.resolution))
00553         offset += sizeof(task.resolution);
00554 
00555         cuda_assert(cuParamSeti(cuFilmConvert, offset, task.x))
00556         offset += sizeof(task.x);
00557 
00558         cuda_assert(cuParamSeti(cuFilmConvert, offset, task.y))
00559         offset += sizeof(task.y);
00560 
00561         cuda_assert(cuParamSeti(cuFilmConvert, offset, task.w))
00562         offset += sizeof(task.w);
00563 
00564         cuda_assert(cuParamSeti(cuFilmConvert, offset, task.h))
00565         offset += sizeof(task.h);
00566 
00567         cuda_assert(cuParamSeti(cuFilmConvert, offset, task.offset))
00568         offset += sizeof(task.offset);
00569 
00570         cuda_assert(cuParamSeti(cuFilmConvert, offset, task.stride))
00571         offset += sizeof(task.stride);
00572 
00573         cuda_assert(cuParamSetSize(cuFilmConvert, offset))
00574 
00575         /* launch kernel: todo find optimal size, cache config for fermi */
00576 #ifndef __APPLE__
00577         int xthreads = 16;
00578         int ythreads = 16;
00579 #else
00580         int xthreads = 8;
00581         int ythreads = 8;
00582 #endif
00583         int xblocks = (task.w + xthreads - 1)/xthreads;
00584         int yblocks = (task.h + ythreads - 1)/ythreads;
00585 
00586         cuda_assert(cuFuncSetCacheConfig(cuFilmConvert, CU_FUNC_CACHE_PREFER_L1))
00587         cuda_assert(cuFuncSetBlockShape(cuFilmConvert, xthreads, ythreads, 1))
00588         cuda_assert(cuLaunchGrid(cuFilmConvert, xblocks, yblocks))
00589 
00590         unmap_pixels(task.rgba);
00591 
00592         cuda_pop_context();
00593     }
00594 
00595     void shader(DeviceTask& task)
00596     {
00597         cuda_push_context();
00598 
00599         CUfunction cuDisplace;
00600         CUdeviceptr d_input = cuda_device_ptr(task.shader_input);
00601         CUdeviceptr d_offset = cuda_device_ptr(task.shader_output);
00602 
00603         /* get kernel function */
00604         cuda_assert(cuModuleGetFunction(&cuDisplace, cuModule, "kernel_cuda_shader"))
00605         
00606         /* pass in parameters */
00607         int offset = 0;
00608         
00609         cuda_assert(cuParamSetv(cuDisplace, offset, &d_input, sizeof(d_input)))
00610         offset += sizeof(d_input);
00611 
00612         cuda_assert(cuParamSetv(cuDisplace, offset, &d_offset, sizeof(d_offset)))
00613         offset += sizeof(d_offset);
00614 
00615         int shader_eval_type = task.shader_eval_type;
00616         offset = align_up(offset, __alignof(shader_eval_type));
00617 
00618         cuda_assert(cuParamSeti(cuDisplace, offset, task.shader_eval_type))
00619         offset += sizeof(task.shader_eval_type);
00620 
00621         cuda_assert(cuParamSeti(cuDisplace, offset, task.shader_x))
00622         offset += sizeof(task.shader_x);
00623 
00624         cuda_assert(cuParamSetSize(cuDisplace, offset))
00625 
00626         /* launch kernel: todo find optimal size, cache config for fermi */
00627 #ifndef __APPLE__
00628         int xthreads = 16;
00629 #else
00630         int xthreads = 8;
00631 #endif
00632         int xblocks = (task.shader_w + xthreads - 1)/xthreads;
00633 
00634         cuda_assert(cuFuncSetCacheConfig(cuDisplace, CU_FUNC_CACHE_PREFER_L1))
00635         cuda_assert(cuFuncSetBlockShape(cuDisplace, xthreads, 1, 1))
00636         cuda_assert(cuLaunchGrid(cuDisplace, xblocks, 1))
00637 
00638         cuda_pop_context();
00639     }
00640 
00641     CUdeviceptr map_pixels(device_ptr mem)
00642     {
00643         if(!background) {
00644             PixelMem pmem = pixel_mem_map[mem];
00645             CUdeviceptr buffer;
00646             
00647             size_t bytes;
00648             cuda_assert(cuGraphicsMapResources(1, &pmem.cuPBOresource, 0))
00649             cuda_assert(cuGraphicsResourceGetMappedPointer(&buffer, &bytes, pmem.cuPBOresource))
00650             
00651             return buffer;
00652         }
00653 
00654         return cuda_device_ptr(mem);
00655     }
00656 
00657     void unmap_pixels(device_ptr mem)
00658     {
00659         if(!background) {
00660             PixelMem pmem = pixel_mem_map[mem];
00661 
00662             cuda_assert(cuGraphicsUnmapResources(1, &pmem.cuPBOresource, 0))
00663         }
00664     }
00665 
00666     void pixels_alloc(device_memory& mem)
00667     {
00668         if(!background) {
00669             PixelMem pmem;
00670 
00671             pmem.w = mem.data_width;
00672             pmem.h = mem.data_height;
00673 
00674             cuda_push_context();
00675 
00676             glGenBuffers(1, &pmem.cuPBO);
00677             glBindBuffer(GL_PIXEL_UNPACK_BUFFER, pmem.cuPBO);
00678             glBufferData(GL_PIXEL_UNPACK_BUFFER, pmem.w*pmem.h*sizeof(GLfloat)*3, NULL, GL_DYNAMIC_DRAW);
00679             
00680             glBindBuffer(GL_PIXEL_UNPACK_BUFFER, 0);
00681             
00682             glGenTextures(1, &pmem.cuTexId);
00683             glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, pmem.cuTexId);
00684             glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGBA, pmem.w, pmem.h, 0, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, NULL);
00685             glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_NEAREST);
00686             glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_NEAREST);
00687             glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0);
00688             
00689             cuda_assert(cuGraphicsGLRegisterBuffer(&pmem.cuPBOresource, pmem.cuPBO, CU_GRAPHICS_MAP_RESOURCE_FLAGS_NONE))
00690 
00691             cuda_pop_context();
00692 
00693             mem.device_pointer = pmem.cuTexId;
00694             pixel_mem_map[mem.device_pointer] = pmem;
00695 
00696             return;
00697         }
00698 
00699         Device::pixels_alloc(mem);
00700     }
00701 
00702     void pixels_copy_from(device_memory& mem, int y, int w, int h)
00703     {
00704         if(!background) {
00705             PixelMem pmem = pixel_mem_map[mem.device_pointer];
00706 
00707             cuda_push_context();
00708 
00709             glBindBuffer(GL_PIXEL_UNPACK_BUFFER, pmem.cuPBO);
00710             uchar *pixels = (uchar*)glMapBuffer(GL_PIXEL_UNPACK_BUFFER, GL_READ_ONLY);
00711             size_t offset = sizeof(uchar)*4*y*w;
00712             memcpy((uchar*)mem.data_pointer + offset, pixels + offset, sizeof(uchar)*4*w*h);
00713             glUnmapBuffer(GL_PIXEL_UNPACK_BUFFER);
00714             glBindBuffer(GL_PIXEL_UNPACK_BUFFER, 0);
00715 
00716             cuda_pop_context();
00717 
00718             return;
00719         }
00720 
00721         Device::pixels_copy_from(mem, y, w, h);
00722     }
00723 
00724     void pixels_free(device_memory& mem)
00725     {
00726         if(mem.device_pointer) {
00727             if(!background) {
00728                 PixelMem pmem = pixel_mem_map[mem.device_pointer];
00729 
00730                 cuda_push_context();
00731 
00732                 cuda_assert(cuGraphicsUnregisterResource(pmem.cuPBOresource))
00733                 glDeleteBuffers(1, &pmem.cuPBO);
00734                 glDeleteTextures(1, &pmem.cuTexId);
00735 
00736                 cuda_pop_context();
00737 
00738                 pixel_mem_map.erase(pixel_mem_map.find(mem.device_pointer));
00739                 mem.device_pointer = 0;
00740 
00741                 return;
00742             }
00743 
00744             Device::pixels_free(mem);
00745         }
00746     }
00747 
00748     void draw_pixels(device_memory& mem, int y, int w, int h, int dy, int width, int height, bool transparent)
00749     {
00750         if(!background) {
00751             PixelMem pmem = pixel_mem_map[mem.device_pointer];
00752 
00753             cuda_push_context();
00754 
00755             /* for multi devices, this assumes the ineffecient method that we allocate
00756                all pixels on the device even though we only render to a subset */
00757             size_t offset = sizeof(uint8_t)*4*y*w;
00758 
00759             glBindBufferARB(GL_PIXEL_UNPACK_BUFFER_ARB, pmem.cuPBO);
00760             glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, pmem.cuTexId);
00761             glTexSubImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, 0, 0, w, h, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, (void*)offset);
00762             glBindBufferARB(GL_PIXEL_UNPACK_BUFFER_ARB, 0);
00763             
00764             glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00765             
00766             if(transparent) {
00767                 glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00768                 glBlendFunc(GL_ONE, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00769             }
00770 
00771             glColor3f(1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f);
00772 
00773             glPushMatrix();
00774             glTranslatef(0.0f, (float)dy, 0.0f);
00775                 
00776             glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00777             
00778             glTexCoord2f(0.0f, 0.0f);
00779             glVertex2f(0.0f, 0.0f);
00780             glTexCoord2f((float)w/(float)pmem.w, 0.0f);
00781             glVertex2f((float)width, 0.0f);
00782             glTexCoord2f((float)w/(float)pmem.w, (float)h/(float)pmem.h);
00783             glVertex2f((float)width, (float)height);
00784             glTexCoord2f(0.0f, (float)h/(float)pmem.h);
00785             glVertex2f(0.0f, (float)height);
00786 
00787             glEnd();
00788 
00789             glPopMatrix();
00790 
00791             if(transparent)
00792                 glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00793             
00794             glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0);
00795             glDisable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00796 
00797             cuda_pop_context();
00798 
00799             return;
00800         }
00801 
00802         Device::draw_pixels(mem, y, w, h, dy, width, height, transparent);
00803     }
00804 
00805     void task_add(DeviceTask& task)
00806     {
00807         if(task.type == DeviceTask::TONEMAP)
00808             tonemap(task);
00809         else if(task.type == DeviceTask::PATH_TRACE)
00810             path_trace(task);
00811         else if(task.type == DeviceTask::SHADER)
00812             shader(task);
00813     }
00814 
00815     void task_wait()
00816     {
00817         cuda_push_context();
00818 
00819         cuda_assert(cuCtxSynchronize())
00820 
00821         cuda_pop_context();
00822     }
00823 
00824     void task_cancel()
00825     {
00826     }
00827 };
00828 
00829 Device *device_cuda_create(DeviceInfo& info, bool background)
00830 {
00831     return new CUDADevice(info, background);
00832 }
00833 
00834 void device_cuda_info(vector<DeviceInfo>& devices)
00835 {
00836     int count = 0;
00837 
00838     if(cuInit(0) != CUDA_SUCCESS)
00839         return;
00840     if(cuDeviceGetCount(&count) != CUDA_SUCCESS)
00841         return;
00842     
00843     vector<DeviceInfo> display_devices;
00844     
00845     for(int num = 0; num < count; num++) {
00846         char name[256];
00847         int attr;
00848         
00849         if(cuDeviceGetName(name, 256, num) != CUDA_SUCCESS)
00850             continue;
00851 
00852         DeviceInfo info;
00853 
00854         info.type = DEVICE_CUDA;
00855         info.description = string(name);
00856         info.id = string_printf("CUDA_%d", num);
00857         info.num = num;
00858 
00859         int major, minor;
00860         cuDeviceComputeCapability(&major, &minor, num);
00861         info.advanced_shading = (major >= 2);
00862 
00863         /* if device has a kernel timeout, assume it is used for display */
00864         if(cuDeviceGetAttribute(&attr, CU_DEVICE_ATTRIBUTE_KERNEL_EXEC_TIMEOUT, num) == CUDA_SUCCESS && attr == 1) {
00865             info.display_device = true;
00866             display_devices.push_back(info);
00867         }
00868         else
00869             devices.push_back(info);
00870     }
00871 
00872     if(!display_devices.empty())
00873         devices.insert(devices.end(), display_devices.begin(), display_devices.end());
00874 }
